location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Political Department letter no. 16 from Lieutenant-Colonel Sir Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: Stannus reports that he had communicated to the Imam of Muscat [Said bin Sultan al-Said] the contents of the Court of Directors' dispatch dated 11 February 1826 concerning Bombassa. The Imam still expected to receive redress for his grievances.
